name: Me and My Pet Rock
description:
Description:

Your pet rock wishes to be a real mountain. You can make his dream come true by taking all of your furniture and piling it up into a home that he can be proud of. In this physics based game you will have to make the mound as high as you can, your pet deserves the best after all.

Controls:                                                                                                                                                                        A / D / right arrow / left arrow:

Rotate the object you are holding, or flip the object if both directions are pressed at once.

W / S / up arrow / down arrow:

Move camera up and down.

What to expect in the future:

Guarantied - A web ver

Guarantied - 2 small visual tweaks from specific bugs that annoy me.

Guarantied - Make it save level complete data

Very probable - Better décor on the levels.

Very probable - Better item balancing (making the smallest items rarer).

Quite likely - An endless version. (I already have it planned).

Likely - More magic wands that effect the already placed objects.

Likely - More objects.

Sort of Likely - More levels.

Technically possible - A bazooka that changed every item into a chicken.

Sources for all of the free assets I used:

The pet rock's expressions were actually made by me, but all other audio and visuals came from free asset packs.

All of the furniture assets, environment assets, and the base image for the pet rock were made by Cainos in this asset pack:

https://cainos.itch.io/pixel-art-platformer-village-props 

The buttons come from adwiter in this asset pack:

https://adwitr.itch.io/button-asset-pack

The backgrounds come from this asset pack:

https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-horizontal-game-backgrounds

The eraser wands come from here:

art-icon-pack-rpg

I'm pretty sure I deleted them from the final product, but if any chickens pop up because I missed one of them, they came from here:

https://pixelplant.itch.io/chicken-sprite-sheet
